name: Funraise Giving Form
author: Funraise, Inc.

sections.description:
What is Funraise

Funraise is the best nonprofit fundraising platform with everything nonprofits need to collect donations, grow recurring donation programs, and manage donors. Funraise’s donation WordPress plugin is the easiest way to add donation forms and donation buttons to your website. Funraise’s WordPress plugin and platform can be used for free.

What you can do with Funraise’s Donation Plugin

Funraise’s donation plugin enables you to add donation forms and donation buttons into your page layout with shortcodes.

  • Use a shortcode to add donation forms to a donation page
  • Use a shortcode to add a donation form launcher button to a page
  • Start or grow your recurring monthly donation programs
  • Multiple payment methods: Credit card, PayPal, Apple Pay, Bitcoin, ACH
  • Custom branding and donation form design
  • Ask custom questions on your donation form
  • Enable donors to dedicate their gift
  • Automatically send donation receipt emails
  • Double your donations with an employer matching integration
  • Trust in Funraise’s state-of-the-art PCI-compliant services
  • Manage your donations and donors in Funraise’s platform

Why use Funraise donation plugin?

When you use Funraise’s donation plugin, you’re getting the best donation form for WordPress and a complete donor management system with Funraise’s platform.

  • Funraise’s donation form is the best nonprofit donation form available
  • Leading organizations collect millions of dollars in online donations with Funraise
  • Start collecting donations on your website in minutes
  • The design and brand elements of your donation form are within your control
  • Create donation reports and donor reports and export your fundraising data
  • Your donors will love how easy it is to make a donation with Funraise’s donation forms
  • Funraise’s donation forms are highly configurable. Customize the ask amounts, allocations, dedications, and contact information you collect.
  • Funraise has a lot more to offer as you grow; for example, you can track marketing sources using UTM parameters as you accept donations, and much more

Funraise is a complete nonprofit fundraising solution

Funraise’s WordPress donation plugin makes it easy to add donation forms and donation buttons to your website, enabling you to collect donations and manage all your donors and donations in one place. Funraise empowers nonprofits by providing exceptional fundraising technology for all types of nonprofit fundraising needs.

Donation Forms
The best donation forms available to nonprofits.

Donor Management
Manage details for every donor. Resend donation receipts, update donor information, create donation reports, and export donation reports.

Donation Reporting
Build custom donation reports and data dashboards.

Peer-to-Peer Fundraising
Expand your donor base and raise more with peer-to-peer fundraising pages.

Recurring Donations
Funraise’s donation form is perfect for your monthly donor program; email donation receipts and recurring donations are automated.

Automated Tasks
Automate important workflows by triggering donation-based tasks for yourself or your team.

Donor Wealth Data
Access your donors’ wealth data, build donor segments, and customize donor communications.

Fundraising Integrations
Funraise is connected to the tools you use, including:

  • Mailchimp
  • Constant Contact
  • Salesforce
  • QuickBooks
  • Facebook
  • Double the Donation
  • And so many more

Nonprofits LOVE Funraise

“The popup donate forms are genius! It’s helped our conversion rate having donors able to donate directly on the page they’re looking at without being redirected elsewhere. Integration with Salesforce and Mailchimp were a must for our organization and we’ve been pleased that Funraise has been able to provide this. Best of all is that help is never far away when we have questions or need help!”
Dave E. | VP Of Marketing

“Funraise has not only helped us raise so much more money, but they’ve also helped relieve us of administration work with their automation, tracking, and report functionality.”
Ashley J. | Founder, Executive Director

“Moving all of our fundraising needs to Funraise was the best thing we have ever done. We are a small grassroots organization and depended on PayPal to process donations but were in need of something more robust that could handle campaigns, data tracking, peer-to-peer campaigns, and provide a comprehensive CRM. Our fundraising on Funraise has exceeded $120,000 and the feedback we hear from our donors is that it is a quick and easy way to donate. A win/win!”
Melissa Y. | Executive Director

“My overall experience with Funraise has been AMAZING. […] The giving form feature is the most impactful and I love the layout of the software. It’s user-friendly and many of my team members utilize the system for their daily responsibilities.”
Tareake R. | Executive Director

Secure donation forms

Funraise prioritizes the security of your data and payments through world-class infrastructure partners and undergoes independent certification processes. Funraise is a PCI Compliant Service Provider and tokenizes all credit card information in a PCI Level 1 certified tokenization vault. Communications to and from Funraise servers are encrypted by TLS 1.2+.

Processing fees

  • With Funraise you can connect your own Stripe, PayPal, or other payment processor. These payment processors charge a fee; for nonprofits collecting donations using Stripe or PayPal, this is usually 2.2% + 30Â¢.
  • Funraise offers a free plan, with no monthly subscription costs. With the Free plan, Funraise charges an additional 3.5% for online donations. Funraise’s Platform Fee is based on your plan.
sections.installation:
How to get started

Follow Funraise’s WordPress Plugin Guide

In a nutshell…

  1. Create a free Funraise account
  2. Install and activate Funraise’s plugin in WordPress
  3. Use a shortcode to place a donation button or donation form on a page

How it works

In Funraise: Copy the shortcode for a particular donation form.
In WordPress: Paste the shortcode into a page text editor.

To place a button that will launch your form:

[funraise button=insert-your-custom-url-string]

To place an open form in your page layout:

[funraise form=insert-your-custom-url-string]
sections.faq:
Do I manage my donors and donations in WordPress?

No. With Funraise’s donation plugin, you will add donation forms to your website. You will manage your donor and donation data inside Funraise’s free platform. Funraise is much more than WordPress plugin ðŸ™‚

Can I connect my own payment gateway?

Yes. You can connect your own payment gateways including Stripe, Paypal, Authorize.net, and many more. Contact us to see if your gateway is supported. Free plans are limited to Stripe and PayPal.

Is Funraise only for nonprofit organizations?

Yes. Your organization must be registered as a nonprofit or NGO. Organizations around the globe can use Funraise, but a national organization identification number is required. As with most things in life, there are exceptions; contact us with questions. Funraise Free plans are only available to organizations in the United States.
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • Expanding supported php versions

1.0

  • Our first release to WordPress. Cheers!

short_description: Use Funraise to add donation forms to your website with a shortcode. Manage donations and donors in Funraise's free platform.
